instruction.instruction_text: Starting from the bedroom, if there is a doll on the crib in the bedroom, leave the bedroom and find the stairs. After going down the stairs, stop. Otherwise, stop in the bedroom.
Starting from the bedroom, if there is a lamp on the bedside table next to the bed, leave the bedroom and find the stairs. After going down the stairs, stop. Otherwise, stop in the bedroom.
From the kitchen, if food is cooking on the stovetop, stop next to it. Otherwise, find the stairs, go upstairs, and stop.
From the living room, if there's a yellow carpet on the floor, then turn left out of the living room into the kitchen and stop by the kitchen cabinet.
From the living room, walk straight to the dining room. If there's no food on the dining table, turn right into the kitchen and stop by the kitchen window; otherwise, stop by the dining table.
Find the pool table and walk over to it. If there's a piece of exercise equipment right next to it, then find the TV in the living room and stop in front of it; otherwise, stop by the pool table.
If the coffee table in front of the living room sofa is empty, find the stairs and stop at the bottom; otherwise, stop by the sofa.

Find the pool table in the living room and go stand next to it. If there are balls on the table but no cue sticks, turn right, find the white fridge, and stop in front of it; otherwise, stop by the pool table.
If there's a piano in the bedroom, leave the bedroom, find the stairs, go downstairs, and stop; otherwise, stop in the bedroom.
Start from the stairwell, walk right into the restaurant. If there are plates on a table, stop next to it; otherwise, return to the stairwell and stop.

Starting from the kitchen, if the cabinets are black, walk forward to the living room couch, then if there's a teacup on the table in front of the couch, stop by the table, or else go to the staircase and stop there; otherwise, stay in the kitchen.
If both the bedroom walls and curtains are blue, leave the bedroom, find the stairs, go down them, and stop. Otherwise, stop in the bedroom.
If there's a potted plant on the top shelf of the bedroom cabinet, leave the bedroom, walk through the corridor, turn left, and stop at the stairs; otherwise, stop in the bedroom.
Go through the hallway to the table on your left. If it has a potted plant, go up the stairs and stop; otherwise, stop by the table.
Walk through the hallway into the living room, go over to the sofa, and if there's no teacup on the coffee table, stop; otherwise, return to your starting point.
Walk to the TV in the living room. If there's a blue carpet on the floor there, then find the glass table behind the sofa and stop at it; otherwise, stop at the TV.
If there are pictures on the living room walls, leave the living room, go down the hall, and stop at the table on the left at the end; otherwise, stop in front of the living room TV.
If there are paintings on the bathroom walls and potted plants in the bathroom, leave the bathroom, go upstairs, and stop; otherwise, stop in front of the bathroom mirror
From the changing room, walk to the TV, and if the living room floor is yellow, keep going straight out of the bedroom and stop by the brown cabinet; otherwise, stop at the TV.
Starting from the bathroom, turn left into the bedroom and walk to the desk. If there's a computer on the desk, go back and stop in the bathroom; otherwise, stop at the desk.

If there's a green backpack hanging on the bedroom wall, leave the bedroom, turn right into another room, and stop in front of the white cabinet in that room; otherwise, stop next to the bed in the original bedroom.
From the bathroom, if its walls are yellow, exit right and stop at the bedroom door. Otherwise, just stay in the bathroom.
If the bedroom curtains are white and the brown cabinet in the bedroom is empty, leave the bedroom, go through the hallway to the living room, and stop in front of the TV.
If there's a treadmill in the living room, stop in front of it; otherwise, stop in front of the living room TV.
If there's a lamp on the bedroom table or the bedroom curtains are blue, leave the bedroom, find the stairs, and stop halfway up them; otherwise, stop by the bed in the bedroom.
If there's a blue bag and a red chair in the bathroom, walk out of the bathroom, turn right, walk into a bedroom, and stop by the bed; otherwise, stay in the bathroom.
If the lamp in the bedroom is on, head out of the bedroom into the next room and stop at the wooden chair there; otherwise, stop by the bed in this room.

Walk next to the living room sofa; if there's a vase on the coffee table in front of it, keep walking forward and stop in front of the green plant next to the glass door; otherwise, stop by the coffee table.

If there's a TV in the bedroom, a blue cabinet, and a green plant next to the cabinet, then leave the bedroom and stop in front of the mural at the corner; otherwise, stop next to the bed in the bedroom.
From the dining room, head to the living room and find the coffee table. If there's a vase on it, go back and stop by the dining table in the dining room; otherwise, stop by the dark blue sofa.

Turn right and go into the living room, then walk over to the white round table. If there's a teacup on it, go and stop in front of the TV; otherwise, stop in front of the blue sofa in the living room.
Turn left into the living room, walk to the living room TV and stop. If the living room curtains are blue, walk to the staircase and stop there; otherwise, stay at the TV.
Walk forward to the kitchen table, and if there are no plates on it, turn right and stop in the bathroom; otherwise, stop next to the table.
From the bathroom, head straight to the kitchen stove. If no food is cooking, stop at the kitchen window; otherwise, stop at the kitchen doorway to the living room.

From the stairwell, turn right and enter the room. Find the computer desk and go stand in front of it. If there's no teacup on the desk, then stand next to it; otherwise, go back to the original stairwell.
From the kitchen stove, walk straight to the fridge. If there's a potted plant on top or if it's black, turn left and stop by the dining table; otherwise, go back to the kitchen stove and stop.
Walk straight to the living room TV. If there's a potted plant on the TV stand or pictures on the wall next to the TV, turn left, go upstairs, and stop. Otherwise, stop in front of the TV.
Walk through the hallway and into the bedroom; if there's a guitar by the bed, go over to it and stop, otherwise go back to where you started.
Go to the nightstand in the bedroom. If there's a lamp and a photo on it, then leave the bedroom, go downstairs, and stop. Otherwise, stop by the cabinet.
Go to the brown table in the bedroom. If it's empty and the black table next to it has items, go to the bathroom next to the bedroom and stop; otherwise, stop next to the brown table.

Walk through the corridor, turn left, and head towards the refrigerator; if there's something on top of it and the sofa next to it is white, stop there, otherwise continue straight and stop by the living room dining table.

Go to the living room and stop by the dining table. If there are dishes on the table or a guitar by the wall next to it, then find the stairs and stop at the foot of the stairs; otherwise, stop by the dining table.
Walk forward, and if there are no teacups on any of the tables in the hall, go up the stairs and stop; otherwise, stop at the table next to the sofa in the hall.

Go through the corridor, turn left, and enter the bedroom. If there's no table in the bedroom, find the white stool in the bedroom and stop in front of it; otherwise, enter the bathroom in the bedroom and stop in front of the bathtub.
Go upstairs, turn left, and walk to the living room TV. Stop there if there's a potted plant on the cabinet next to it; otherwise, turn left and walk to the kitchen refrigerator and stop there.
Go forward to the storage room, find the bike inside, and if it's red, stop next to it; otherwise, return to your starting point.

Step out of your room, find the washing machine in the apartment and walk up to it; if there are two washing machines and the one you're at has a purple basket above it, stop there, otherwise return to your starting point
Start from the dining table, walk forward to the living room TV. If there are plants on both sides of the TV, return to the dining table and stop; otherwise, stop in front of the TV.
Head from the bathroom, turn right into the next bedroom and go to the TV; if there are statues and photo frames on the TV stand, stop there, otherwise return to the bathroom.
Once you go down the corridor and turn left to find the table, if there's a computer on it, stop in the adjacent restroom; otherwise, stop in front of the table.
Go up from the middle of the stairs, turn left into the room, and walk to the table. If there's a teacup or a plant on it, go back to the middle of the stairs; otherwise, stay by the table.
Go upstairs, turn right and enter the room; if it's empty, walk to the window and stop, otherwise go back to the top of the stairs and stop.
If you're in the bathroom and its tiles are white with paintings on the walls, then leave that bedroom and go to the next one, stopping by the bed; otherwise, just stay in the bathroom.

Walk forward into the living room and go to the small table next to the sofa. If there's a vase on it, pick it up and take it to the big dining table in the dining room and stop there; otherwise, go to the living room TV and stop.
Go to the kitchen, find the white table, and if there's fruit on it, stop in front of the kitchen fridge; otherwise, go back to your starting point.

If there are green plants in the bathroom, leave; otherwise, stay. Walk straight to the black cabinet and stand in front of it. If it has a lot of books on top, turn left and stop by the bedroom bed; otherwise, stop at the cabinet.
If there's a globe on the nightstand in the bedroom, the bed is blue and has dolls next to it, then leave the bedroom and stop at the cabinet by the door; otherwise, stop by the bed.
Go through the hallway into the bedroom, and if the pillow on the bed is blue and there's a bedside lamp, stop by the bed; otherwise, go back to where you started.
Go through the hallway to the bedroom and walk to the bedroom table. If there's a plate on it, stop; otherwise, stop in front of the painting on the bedroom wall.
If there's a red lamp and a vase in the bedroom, leave the bedroom, find the stairs leading upstairs, and stop at the bottom; otherwise, stop by the bed in the bedroom.

From your second-floor bedroom, head downstairs to the first-floor bathroom. If you spot a red plastic basin on the floor there, turn around and stop at the wall clock downstairs; otherwise, head back to your second-floor bedroom.
From the bathroom, go down the hall to the room by the stairs. If you find the laptop on the table in that room, go upstairs and stop at the round table in the living room.

From the living room, walk to the lit lamp, then go halfway up the stairs before returning, head to the dining room, and if there's a green potted plant on the cabinet next to the table, stop at the picture on the wall across from it.

Start at the door, go down the hall to the living room couch. If there are two pictures on the wall behind the couch, head to the room closest to the mirror and stop at the cabinet with the gray handbag on its top shelf.
From the stairs, go into the shower room. If you see two yellow towels in there, grab them, leave the room, turn right, and put them on the black chair next to the crib in the next room.

From the bathroom, go to the bedroom; if there's a desk with a computer on it, or a clothes rack in the bedroom, stop by the bed; otherwise, turn right out of the bedroom, find the stairs, and stop at the stairs.
Go from the kitchen to the stairs. If you find airplane models on the table just before them, head upstairs and stop at the computer desk; otherwise, stop right there at the stairs.

Head from the walk-in closet to the bedroom; if one bedside lamp is on and the other is off, go downstairs, turn right, and stop at the dining table with the vase; otherwise, go back to the walk-in closet.
Go from the kitchen to the living room. If there's a teacup on the round dining table, go up to the second floor and stop at the walk-in closet door.
From your bedroom, walk to the nightstand. If the lamp is on, then head out to the hallway and stop when you reach the third picture on the wall.

From the downstairs bedroom, if the table lamp is on, go out to the living room, and if there's a vase on the table, go upstairs to the second floor and stop; otherwise, stop at the living room table. If the lamp isn't on, just stop at the lamp.

Starting from the first-floor living room, find a dining table; if it's empty, head down the right aisle to another room and stop if you find a vase on the table there, otherwise go back to where you started; if it's not empty, just stop at that table.
Walk into the living room, go to the lamp by the window. If it's off, go back to the downstairs stairs; otherwise, stop at the lamp.
From the bathroom, if there's a white towel on the bathroom door, go into the bedroom; otherwise, stop at the door. If the bedside lamp in the bedroom is on, go halfway down the stairs.
Start halfway down the stairs, turn right into a bedroom, and if it has two beds, leave; if not, stop at the bathroom door on your left, then head down the hall to the purple rug and stop on it
Starting in the bedroom, if the lamp isn't on, go to the living room, find the green plant by the TV, and stop there.
From the closet, if there's a black shirt on the closet door, go to the living room and stop in front of the TV.
Go straight from the dining room, and if there's a pot on the stove, continue to the bedroom and stop at the TV, or else go back to the dining room
From the dining room, head straight to the kitchen. If you see a fruit plate and a vase on the kitchen table, turn right into the living room and stop in front of the white sofa.
From the living room, if you see two vases on the wooden cabinet, turn right into the dining room and stop in front of the large plant in the corner.
From the living room fireplace, if there's a white fan on the ceiling, go straight until you reach the vase on the black table; otherwise, just stay at the fireplace.
From the stairs, if the living room table is clear, go straight until you're right under the picture on the dining room wall; otherwise, stop at the table.

From the kitchen, if there's no pot on the stove, go to the dining room, and then if you find a plate of fruit on the dining table, stop at the stairs leading up, or else head back to the kitchen; otherwise, just stay in the kitchen.
If you're in the bathroom and see it's daytime through the window, step out into the bedroom and stop at the chair.

Starting from your computer desk, if the desk lamp is on, turn around and head right into the bedroom, and then if the bed has a white comforter, stop by the bed, otherwise return to the computer desk; if the lamp is off, just stop.
From the bedroom, if the bedside lamp is on, leave through the right-hand door and stop at the bathroom mirror.

Starting from the staircase, if the living room is carpeted, turn around and head to the bedroom, where you'll stop under the wall picture if there are two beds, or else return to your starting point; otherwise, just stop.
If the bedroom light is on, leave the room and stop at the stairs; otherwise, stay in the bedroom.
If you see a TV in this room, leave and go straight to the next room, find a brown chair there, and stop by it. Otherwise, stay in this room.

From the bedroom, if there's a painting on the wall, head to the living room, otherwise stay put; then, if in the living room the wall behind the sofa has a painting, stop at the brown cabinet, or else go back to where you started.
Go straight, then turn right into a room. If it's empty, go to the window and stop; otherwise, head back to where you started.
Go straight into the kitchen, and if you see a plate on the kitchen table, turn right, go straight, and stop on the red carpet in the living room.
From the living room, if there's a red carpet, go to the bedroom, and if there's one there too, stop in front of the TV.
From your bedroom, go to the kitchen and find the gray fridge. If there's a potted plant in front of it, stop at the counter directly opposite the fridge; otherwise, go back to where you started.

Find a shelf in the bathroom; if you see flowers on the top, leave, turn left into the bedroom, and if that bed has a grey comforter, stop in front of it, otherwise return to the bathroom; if not, just stay at the shelf.

From your bedroom, go to the shelf. If there are books on it, turn right into the living room and find the dining table. If you see a vase there, stop; otherwise, or if there were no books on the shelf, go back to where you started.

Walk straight until you see a coffee table in front of a sofa. If there's a yellow vase on it, turn left and keep walking until you find a dining table. If there's a vase on that, turn left again into the kitchen and stop.
Go straight. If you see a wooden box in the living room, go into the bedroom and stop at the window; otherwise, stop at the living room sofa
If there is a gray cabinet in the bathroom, go upstairs to the second floor; otherwise, stop on the mat at the bathroom door.
From the living room, walk straight to the study. If there's a laptop on the desk, continue to the washing machine in the laundry room next door and stop there; otherwise, return to the living room.
From the kitchen, if the black table is clear, go to the living room and stop in front of the sofa. Otherwise, go back to the kitchen.
Walk to the tan cabinet in the room, and if it's empty, continue on to the red sofa; otherwise, head back to the start.
If there's a red sofa in the room, head down to the first floor and stop at the brown cabinet. Otherwise, just stop at the tan cabinet in the room.

tarting from the kitchen, if the counter is clear, go into the living room to the TV; if there's a vase beside the TV, stop at the living room fireplace. Otherwise, just head back to your starting point in the kitchen.
Walk from your bedroom into the living room and find the TV; if you see a vase next to it, keep walking to the grey table in the living room and stop there; otherwise, go back to your bedroom.

From the kitchen, go to the living room and find the gray dining table and the coffee table in front of the right-side sofa. If both have plants on them, stop at the bedroom door; otherwise, return to your starting point.
From your bedroom, go straight then turn right to leave. If the light outside is on, turn right again and go straight to the computer and stop there; otherwise, head back to your bedroom.
Go straight ahead, then take a left and keep walking until you reach the windowsill. If you find any green plants on it, stop there; if not, go back to your starting point.

Walk straight from the living room to the computer desk and stop; if there's a white keyboard on it, turn around and go to the black fridge in the kitchen and stop, otherwise return to your starting point.
Go to the living room and find the coffee table in front of the TV. If there's a plate on it, pick it up and put it on the black table behind the sofa; otherwise, go back to where you started.
Walk straight, then turn right into the bedroom. If you see it's sunny outside through the French window, go to the bed and stop beside it. Otherwise, go back to where you started.
From the storage room, head straight to the living room; if the couch is teal, turn right into the bedroom and stop at the walk-in closet door.
From your bedroom, head to the walk-in closet. If you find a yellow suitcase there, go to the living room and stop by the black fridge. Otherwise, just stay by your bed.
Walk forward to the living room TV. If you see a plant next to it, then head to the black fridge in the living room and stop there; otherwise, go back to where you started.

From the kitchen, if the stovetop is clear, turn right into the living room, and if there's an AC on the living room wall, turn left, walk to the TV, and stop in front of it; otherwise, just stay put.

From the bathroom, if there's a gray towel by the sink, head into the bedroom; then, if the cabinet lamp is lit, go to the bedroom door and stop, otherwise go back to the bathroom; else, stay in the bathroom.

From your bedroom: if there's a purple carpet on the floor, go straight to the next room, and if you see a blue jersey there, stop by the bed, otherwise return to your original bedroom; if not, just stay put.
Walk from the kitchen to the living room; if you find a treadmill there that's next to a window, go to the living room TV, otherwise, head back to the kitchen.
From the bathroom, walk straight to the bedroom; if the quilt on the bed is gray, leave the bedroom, go to the kitchen, and stop in front of the stove; otherwise, go back to the bathroom.

Starting from the bathroom, if the wall tiles are white and black, leave, take a right to the bedroom, then if the curtains aren't black, stop by the bed, otherwise head back to the bathroom; if the tiles aren't, just stay put.
From the stair landing, go straight and take a right into the bedroom. If it's empty, stop in front of the window; otherwise, head back to the stair landing.
Go from your bedroom to the living room fireplace. If there's a painting above it, stop at the stairs upstairs; otherwise, go back to your bedroom.
Go from the kitchen to the living room, find the coffee table there, and walk up to it. If there's a grey rug underneath it, stop in front of the fireplace; otherwise, go back to where you started.

From the kitchen, if the counter is clear, head to the round dining table. Then, if that table has flowers, go to the living room and stop at the round coffee table; otherwise, return to the kitchen. If the counter isn't clear, just stay in the kitchen.
Leave the bathroom, turn right, and go to the bedroom. If you see a red pillow on the bed, stop at the window; otherwise, go back to the bathroom.
Exit the bathroom, turn left, and head to the brown nightstand in the bedroom. If you see a yellow lamp on it, stop there; otherwise, go back to the bathroom.
Starting from the bathroom, if there's a vase on the sink, go downstairs and stop. Otherwise, stay in the bathroom.
Starting from the bathroom, exit and turn right into the room to find the crib. If there's a plush toy in it, stop in front of the room's window; otherwise, go back to the bathroom.
If the lights are on in the room, leave the room, find the stairs, go downstairs, and stop; otherwise, stay in the room.
From the kitchen, if the counter is clear, go upstairs and stop; otherwise, stop in the kitchen.
Go from the bathroom, turn right into a bedroom. If the bed covers are white, stop by the window; otherwise, go back to where you started in the bathroom.
Start from the living room and walk straight to the dining room; if there's a white tablecloth on the dining table, find the TV and stop in front of it, otherwise, go back to where you started.

Go from the walk-in closet to the living room and find the TV. If you see a blue bottle on the cabinet under the TV, then keep going straight, turn right to the stairs, and stop at the bottom of them. Otherwise, go back to the walk-in closet.
Go to the white table behind the sofa in the room, and if you find a cardboard box on it, stop at the bottom of the stairs; otherwise, go back to where you started.
From the kitchen, go to the yellow dining table in the living room. If there's nothing on it, then go to the TV in the living room and stop in front of it; otherwise, just go back to the kitchen.

Start from the bed in your room. Find the grey sofa. If there's a black table next to it with a globe on top, then head out to the living room and stop by the sofa there. Otherwise, go back to the bed in your room.

Start from the living room, find the lamp by the sofa and walk up to it. If the lamp's on, continue on to the yellow dining table; otherwise, head back to the TV in the living room. If there's nothing on the dining table, keep going to the kitchen and stop; otherwise, go back to the TV in the living room.

From the kitchen doorway, walk forward into the living room, go to the TV, and stand in front of it; then, if there's a red sofa in the living room or a green plant next to the TV, return to the kitchen doorway, otherwise stop in front of the TV.

From the living room dining table, head to the kitchen, find the stove, and stand in front of it. If there's a pot on the stove or the kitchen wall is white, stay in front of the stove; otherwise, go back to the living room dining table.

Starting from the kitchen door, turn right and go straight until you find the bedroom. If there are two beds in the bedroom and their quilts are different colors, go back to the kitchen door; otherwise, stay by the bed.
From the bedroom door, walk into the living room and go to the sofa. If it's black or has a green plant next to it, go back to the bedroom door; otherwise, stay by the sofa.

From the living room, head straight to the dining table. If it's covered with a yellow tablecloth or has a plate of fruit on it, turn left and stop by the fridge; otherwise, go back to your original spot in the living room.

From the bathroom, if you find a yellow towel, exit and turn left into the living room to find the table lamp and go next to it, and if it's not lit, then go in front of the living room TV; otherwise, stay in the bathroom.
From the stairwell, take a right into a room, and if you find a table lamp, continue to the storage room door, stopping there only if there's a blue box; otherwise, head back to the stairwell.

First, walk straight to the living room, find the sofa, and stand in front of it. If the sofa is red or there's a vase on the table next to it, go upstairs to the second floor and stop; otherwise, stop in front of the sofa.
From the bathroom, turn left into the bedroom. If there are two bedside lamps and the comforter on the bed is white, go back to the bathroom; otherwise, stay by the bed.
Start from the kitchen, walk straight to the hall. If the hall is empty, go downstairs and stop. Otherwise, go back to the kitchen.

Start from the walk-in closet and walk forward to the side of the bedroom bed; if the bedroom curtains are red, leave the bedroom for the living room, otherwise return to the walk-in closet. If there's a lamp on in the living room, stop in front of the living room sofa, otherwise go back to the bedroom.
First, go to the coffee table by the sofa. If it's clear or there's a blue pillow on the sofa, turn right and stop in front of the kitchen stove; otherwise, stop in front of the sofa.
Find the stove. If there are two pots on it and some fruit on the table opposite it, walk to the living room sofa and stop there; otherwise, stop in front of the stove.
If the room's floor is grey and there are teal boxes in it, walk up to the teal boxes; otherwise, stay put.
If the room's carpet is red and the walls are light yellow, leave the room, go up the stairs to the second floor, and then stop; otherwise, stay in the room.

From near the stairs on the second floor, if you see a ladder, go downstairs, turn right, and find the square dining table, then if it's not brown, continue straight to the kitchen, otherwise stay by the table; otherwise, stay on the second floor.
Starting from the bedroom, if the bed is red or the wall is blue, stay in the bedroom; otherwise, leave the bedroom and go straight to the study to stop at the table.

Walk forward, then turn left into the kitchen. If there's a blue clock on the wall and a fruit bowl on the counter, stop at the fruit bowl. If there's just a blue clock, stop at the clock. Otherwise, return to your starting point.

From the living room, if the living room sofa is dark brown and there's nothing on the coffee table, head straight and turn left to find the stairs, then go up to the second floor and stop. Otherwise, stop by the living room sofa.
Go from the bathroom to the bedroom. If there's a red pillow on the bed and the bedside lamp is on, then go downstairs and stop; otherwise, go back to the bathroom and stop.
Go up the stairs, walk straight down the hall, and enter the room on the right; if it has only one bed, stop at the table inside, otherwise, return to your starting point.

If there's a white tablecloth on the round table and a painting on the wall next to it, walk forward and stop in front of the living room TV; otherwise, stop by the window next to your starting point.

Go down the corridor to the living room and find the white table. If there's a vase on it and a clock on the wall behind it, go up the stairs to the second floor and stop; otherwise, stop by the table.

From the bedroom, if the bedside lamp is on, leave the room; otherwise, stay put. Then, turn left into the bathroom. If you see towels on the wall, stop there; otherwise, go back to the original bedroom.
Walk to the bedroom and then to the wooden chair; if the bed has a plaid comforter and the nightstand lamp is off, go downstairs and stop, otherwise, stay at the wooden chair in the bedroom.
From the kitchen, if the kitchen table is clear, leave the kitchen and turn right into the living room. If the living room sofa is gray, stop in front of the TV; otherwise, go back to the kitchen.
From the kitchen, turn right into the living room and go to the sofa. If the sofa is white and has a vase next to it, stop there; otherwise, return to your starting point in the kitchen.

Walk forward to the living room sofa, find the coffee table in front of it, and if there's a TV remote on the coffee table and some green plants around the living room, stop in front of the TV; otherwise, return to your starting point.

From the kitchen, walk straight ahead to the white square table; if it has three potted plants, go to the living room sofa, and if that sofa isn't blue, stay put, otherwise head back to the kitchen; if the table doesn't have three potted plants, then just stay at the table.
If there are some tables and a piano in the room, walk forward until you reach the doorway on the left side of the room, or else go back to where you started.
Go straight, then turn right into the bedroom. If the duvet on the bed isn't blue, stop by the floor-to-ceiling window; otherwise, stop by the bedside lamp.
Go down the stairs to the living room and find the dining table; if there's a vase on it, stop in front of the TV in the living room, otherwise, go back upstairs.

From the kitchen, walk forward into the living room, find the sofa and stop next to it. If there's a red throw pillow on the sofa and a vase on the coffee table in front, continue to the stairs and stop halfway up; otherwise, just stay next to the sofa.

Starting from the middle of the stairs, go downstairs and turn left into the living room to find the square dining table. If the chairs next to it are black and there's a vase on the table, stop by the table; otherwise, return to the middle of the stairs.
Walk forward into the kitchen, and if the kitchen cabinets are brown or there's a pot on the stove, find the fridge and stop in front of it; otherwise, go back to the couch in the living room.
Starting from the kitchen, if the house has wooden walls and there's a black sofa in the living room, stop by the living room sofa; otherwise, stop by the kitchen fridge.

From the kitchen, go out, turn right into the living room, find the TV, and stop in front of it; if the living room carpet is blue or the sofa is black, leave the living room and stop at the kitchen door, otherwise remain in front of the TV.

From the bathroom, if the walls have paintings and are white, walk forward out to the living room, where if there's a TV, you stop in front of it, or else return to the bathroom; otherwise, stay in the bathroom.

Starting from the second-floor staircase, go downstairs, turn left into the kitchen, and head to the kitchen counter. If there's a pot on the counter or a fruit plate next to it, stop by the counter; otherwise, go upstairs to the second floor and stop.
Go forward from the kitchen to the dining table; if it has a red tablecloth or some plates, stay there; otherwise, return to your starting point in the kitchen.
Walk through the hallway straight into the living room, and if the sofa is dark blue or the carpet is red, find the pool table and stop right next to it.

Go down the stairs from the second floor to the first floor, find the light-colored square table in the living room, and if it has a tablecloth or plates on it, stop by the table; otherwise, return to the top of the stairs on the second floor.
If you see a wall with tools and another wall with maps, find the pool table and stop next to it; otherwise, stay put.
From the bathroom, if you see a white towel on the glass door, exit the bathroom and take the stairs to the second floor; otherwise, stop.
From the bedroom, if the quilt on the bed is blue or there's a red pillow on it, leave for the living room and stop in front of the sofa; otherwise, stop by the green plant next to the bed.

Walk forward to the living room. If there's a blue carpet in the living room or flowers on the coffee table in front of the sofa, turn left to find the round dining table and stop in front of it; otherwise, stop next to the sofa.

Locate the square dining table in the living room; if it has plates on it or a blue tablecloth, stop by it; otherwise, proceed to the kitchen, and if there's food cooking on the stove, return to the dining table, or if not, stop by the stove.
Walk from the kitchen straight to the living room. Stop on the rug if there are two small tables next to it, one with a lamp and the other with a vase; otherwise, return to the kitchen.
From the bathroom, turn left and walk straight into the bedroom. If there are two table lamps next to the bed, stop in front of the black cabinet beside the lamps; otherwise, return to the bathroom.

From the bathroom, if there's a black curtain in it, leave the bathroom and turn left into the bedroom. If there's a crib there, walk to it and stop. Otherwise, find the stairs, go downstairs, and stop.

First, go down the stairs, walk forward to the bedroom, and find the table there. If there's a vase on the table or if the table is blue, stop in front of it; otherwise, go back up the stairs and stop.
From the bathroom, turn left into the bedroom and find the gray table. If there's a vase or a green plant on it, stop by the table; otherwise, go back and stop in the bathroom.
Go straight down the corridor to find the blue cabinet. If it has flowers on it, go down the stairs and stop; otherwise, go back to where you started.
From the balcony, head into the living room and find the dining table; if you see a vase and teacups on it, keep going and stop by the sofa, otherwise, go upstairs to the second floor and stop.
Start from the bathroom, go straight, then turn right into the bedroom; if the bed there is green or there's a table, go back to the bathroom, otherwise stop in front of the yellow cabinet.
Walk into the bedroom. If the ceiling fan is white or there are red pillows on the bed, go back to the start; otherwise, stop by the window.

From the kitchen, walk forward to the coffee table in the living room; if there's a vase on it or a blue rug on the floor, turn around and stop in the kitchen, otherwise go to the green plant in the living room and stop.

Walk forward to the square dining table, and if there's a vase on the table along with a lamp and green plants next to it, turn back and stop in front of the living room fireplace; otherwise, stop by the table.

Leave your room, go downstairs, then turn right to the fridge and stop there, unless there's a vase on the table by the fridge and a plant next to it, in which case head back and stop at the staircase.
From the bedroom, if there's a cup or a chessboard on the table, leave the bedroom, go up the stairs, and stop halfway up. Otherwise, stop by the bed.
Head to the living room TV. If there's a clock above it and a plant next to it, take the stairs up to the second floor and stop; otherwise, just stop in front of the TV.
If there's a blue carpet, a dark gray sofa, and a yellow table in the living room, exit the living room, turn left into the bedroom, and stop by the bed.
From the bathroom, walk into the bedroom and if the bed has a blue quilt or a vase next to it, stop at the bedroom doorway; otherwise, stop by the bed.
